content.text:
# 2017 Independence Cup (Albania)

2017 Independence Cup () is the 9th edition of the football tournament Independence Cup. It was held in the annual anniversary of Albanian Flag Day. The participants were Albanian team Tirana, Macedonian club Struga (replacing ShkÃ«ndija), Montenegrin club Otrant and Kosovan club Liria (replacing Besa).
Struga won the tournament after penalty shoot-out.
